body_html: Just want to add something here, I implemented a multiprocess-based data feeding pipeline for multi-task learning. avg. GPU utilization >90% and quad-core CPU utilization >95%. In case anyone interested: https://hanxiao.github.io/2017/07/07/Get-10x-Speedup-in-Tensorflow-Multi-Task-Learning-using-Python-Multiprocessing/

body: Just want to add something here, I implemented a **multiprocess-based** data feeding pipeline for multi-task learning. avg. GPU utilization >90% and quad-core CPU utilization >95%. In case anyone interested: https://hanxiao.github.io/2017/07/07/Get-10x-Speedup-in-Tensorflow-Multi-Task-Learning-using-Python-Multiprocessing/
